title: darwin signed package has very old documentation
body:
by **tobia.conforto**: 
The latest stable and signed package for MacOS X, go1.0.3.darwin-amd64-signed.pkg,
contains some very old documentation. The install.html file talks about 6g and
makefiles. I have tested a few other 1.0.3 packages and they don't seem to have this
problem.
